code: import http from"../http-common";var getAll=function getAll(){return http.get("/tutorials");};var get=function get(id){return http.get("/tutorials/"+id);};var create=function create(data){return http.post("/tutorials",data);};var askForQR=function askForQR(data){return http.post("/get_code",data);};var update=function update(id,data){return http.put("/tutorials/"+id,data);};var remove=function remove(id){return http.delete("/tutorials/"+id);};var removeAll=function removeAll(){return http.delete("/tutorials");};var findByTitle=function findByTitle(title){return http.get("/tutorials?title="+title);};export default{getAll:getAll,get:get,create:create,askForQR:askForQR,update:update,remove:remove,removeAll:removeAll,findByTitle:findByTitle};
